mapper.select: SELECT stu.student_id, stu.student_name, stu.gender, stu.age, stu.branch_id, stu.career_mon, stu.course_id, brn.branch_name, crs.course_name FROM uzuz_student stu LEFT OUTER JOIN branch brn ON stu.branch_id = brn.branch_id LEFT OUTER JOIN course crs ON stu.course_id = crs.course_id ORDER BY stu.student_id

SELECT stu.student_id, stu.student_name, stu.gender, stu.age, stu.branch_id, stu.career_mon, stu.course_id, brn.branch_name, crs.course_name FROM uzuz_student stu LEFT OUTER JOIN branch brn ON stu.branch_id = brn.branch_id LEFT OUTER JOIN course crs ON stu.course_id = crs.course_id WHERE stu.student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY stu.student_id
